author: mo_0x1
content:
For `ethereum/tests`, test `validInvalid_32` for EOF... I'm getting an unmatched validation related to: 

> the total size of the container must be 13 + 2*num_code_sections + types_size + code_size[0] + ... + code_size[num_code_sections-1] + data_size

author: mo_0x1
content: where the `data_size` is off by 1 (`header.data_size == b'\x00\x04'` but `len(body.data_section) == 3`)

author: mo_0x1
content: if I don't validate against that, everything else is good... just trying to get a sanity check

author: oripomerantz
content: I need to look it up. I'll try to do it this weekend.
